extendedInfo.description: DroidAnalytics was built to give you a fast and intuitive way to visualize your Google â¢ Analytics â¢ data. Not only will you be able to see daily, weekly and yearly stats for your Pages Views, Visitors, Visits, Bounce Rate, Time, and Page per Visits, we have also included amazing graphs to make sense of all this data.Thanks to DroidAnalytics,  you will get rich insights into your website traffic.

reviews.title: Annoying
reviews.comment: Annoying start up question of whether I wish to see Magma\'s games has been added. Magma: I paid for this app, I don\'t want games; your games question has run it\'s course now, you\'re had the main benefit if there is any, please now remove it. Thanks.
reviews.author: Julian Smith

reviews.title: Requires you to reveal your Google password
reviews.comment: Instead of using the authentication procedures built into Android, which don\'t require you to enter your password, this app needs your login name and password. A security risk not worth taking.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It was good
reviews.comment: It was a great app until they started adding popups inviting you to try out their games.  Its rediculous to have to deal with spam in a paid app.  I no longer recommend this app anymore.
reviews.author: Terrence Brown

reviews.title: From paid to free!?!@!* now with crapware too!
reviews.comment: WTF?!?! We paid this app now you make it free, which it\'s fine it\'s your choice. But you now make it a crapware? All the annoying ads and intrusive force on you apps is beyond annoying. Could you get your rear and work on a completely free version instead of ruining for the paid user?
reviews.author: Howard Kuo

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: The spp itself isn\'t bad hower getting constant spammed my the maker about their other apps when I\'ve paid fir this one is not on
reviews.author: David Taylor

reviews.title: Too much spam
reviews.comment: Was good, now it is annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spam
reviews.comment: Great. Paid for it now dev makes it free with fake advert notifications. Avoid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t bother
reviews.comment: Won\'t let me login in. Uninstall
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Anandonware
reviews.comment: This is a very disappointing developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It WAS good, now it\'s BAD
reviews.comment: Paid for the app and getting ads?! What\'s that? Login to account doesn\'t work anymore. Shame!
reviews.author: Arthur Arts

reviews.comment: No longer works, feels like abandonware
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I have a license for this after buying it through the App Marketplace about 6 months ago. After the last update, it just says that I have an unlicensed copy and doesn\'t let me log in. I tried emailing the support address, but it bounced. Buyer beware.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It no longer works
reviews.comment: As with others, the app no longer works after the last update, giving me a license error. I\'ve emailed support, will change the rating if they respond and fix the issue, it was a great app...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cant open
reviews.comment: Like many people,.it tell me I dont have license... it was a cool app, hope u can fix it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No licence
reviews.comment: After the last update i cannot open the app anymore. It tells me i have no licence. Samsung galaxy s2/android 4.0.3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Out of date and poorly developed.
reviews.comment: When I first purchased this app there wasn\'t much else available. Even then it offered very limited functionality and I preferred using my phones browser to this app. A couple years later and the app\'s only update has been to correct the new login system. This didn\'t fix the problem. It actualy broke the app on my phone. There are now much better apps available for google analytics. Don\'t waste your time or money on this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix it please
reviews.comment: Says I have no license after I paid for it. Other people who seem to have the same problem from the the comments here.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update* Please fix licensing issue!
reviews.comment: 8/30 Update worked for first launch and logged in OK. On 2nd launch it crashed and on the 3rd it gave unlicensed app error. Error continues, app will not launch. -Samsung Galaxy Nexus  -- Very fast and useful.  Just needs to be updated more
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working anymore
reviews.comment: I now use a free app that is better than this one.
reviews.author: A Google User
